content: **dream and shine** 1 is a beautiful scarf crocheted in the incredible and soft metallico yarn the yarn has a pretty metallic look that brings lots of life to the scarf it s crocheted in a simple pattern with x-stitches and a pretty edge **pattern information** stitch count must be a multiple of 24 + 4 **materials** 7 skeins of metallico color 06 crochet hook 5 mm us size h/8 **yarn quality** metallico hobbii 70% polyamide 21% acrylic 9% wool/ 50 g = 115 meter **size** onesize **measurements** width 40 cm length 200 cm **abbreviations** **slip_stitch** - slip_stitch **chain** - chain **single_crochet** - single_crochet **double_crochet** - double_crochet **trb** - treble_crochet **decrease** - crochet 2 single_crochet together **hashtags for social media** #hobbiifriends #hobbiidreamandshine 1 https //hobbii com/dream-and-shine-scarf utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=dream-and-shine-scarf+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
